item.description:
This movie opens two weeks prior, hopefully it won't be too crowded. The movie is scheduled for 4:20, the time may change by 5/26, we'll go to whichever one is between 4-5.

It is a 2 hour movie, we'll get dinner afterward. Either Hillside Pizza or some other restaurant that anyone wants to try, we've got two weeks to decide.

About the original "Dark Shadows" from Jonathan Frid's obituary, courtesy of the NYT;

http://www.nytimes.com/2012/04/20/arts/television/jonathan-frid-ghoulish-dark-shadows-star-dies-at-87.html?_r=1&hpw

A little bit about this movie from the imdb;

"An imprisoned vampire, Barnabas Collins, is set free and returns to his ancestral home, where his dysfunctional descendants are in need of his protection."

The link is;

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1077368/

Manohla Dargis' review from today's NYT;

http://movies.nytimes.com/2012/05/11/movies/johnny-depp-stars-in-tim-burtons-dark-shadows.html?adxnnl=1&adxnnlx=1336756090-UCdvU/I5tgVw3OitHdbd0w

 

The director is Tim Burton -  Edward Scissorhands, Beetlejuice, and many other off-center films. His filmography, from the imdb;

http://www.imdb.com/name/nm0000318/

Reviews should be out this Thursday.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet to the right of the concession stand, in the doorway that leads to the theater's arcade.
item.name: Save the date! Dark Shadows!
